name: Aerial Predation
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.

name: Ainok Bond-Kin
oracle_text:
Outlast {1}{W} ({1}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has first strike.
flavor_text: "Hold the line, for family and the fallen!"

name: Amass the Components
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: "I knew I'd find a use for all that newt spittle!"

name: Angel of Mercy
oracle_text:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Every tear shed is a drop of immortality.

name: Bala Ged Scorpion
oracle_text: When Bala Ged Scorpion enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 1 or less.
flavor_text: Fast and lethal, with a penchant for the weak and infirm.

name: Balustrade Spy
oracle_text:
Flying
When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

name: Benevolent Ancestor
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Although the door is flimsy and the lock pathetically small, Josuri's family never fears the night outside.

name: Bewilder
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Teferi snapped his fingers, and the viashino started clucking like a chicken. Silly, yes, but exactly the thing we needed to break the stifling tension."
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Blinding Mage
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

name: Borderland Marauder
oracle_text: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

name: Butcher's Glee
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn. Regenerate it. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: The Crave made Kneecleaver think she was bigger than the dragon.

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

name: Claustrophobia
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Crowned Ceratok
oracle_text:
Trample
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

name: Darksteel Axe
flavor_text: Heavier than it looks, tricky to wield, guaranteed to last.

name: Dead Reveler
oracle_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: He's the unlife of the party.

name: Diminish
oracle_text: Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Everything seems a little less ferocious when it's running from a house cat.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The tools of evil are mere things. And like all things, they cannot last forever."
—*Song of All*, canto 881

name: Dissolve
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: "You thought only the gods could stop you?"

name: Doomed Traveler
oracle_text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

name: Doorkeeper
oracle_text:
Defender
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control with defender.
flavor_text: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.

name: Draconic Roar
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

name: Dragon Bell Monk
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: He has spent years training his eyes and ears to detect the subtle signs of a dragon's approach.

name: Dragon Egg
oracle_text:
Defender
When Dragon Egg dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor_text: Dragon birth lairs are littered with treasure to entice the young from their eggs.

name: Dragonlord's Servant
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."
—Liliana Vess

name: Durkwood Baloth
oracle_text: Suspend 5—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Duskdale Wurm
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text:
"Last time, it tore up the Wilt-Leaf, turned Mistmeadow into a mudhole, and made the river jump its banks. On the bright side, we were eating venison for weeks."
—Donal Alloway, cenn of Kinscaer

name: Earth Elemental
flavor_text: Earth elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

name: Elusive Spellfist
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Elusive Spellfist gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"Learn to see an obstacle from a new perspective. Underneath, for example."
—Chanyi, Ojutai monk

name: Emerge Unscathed
oracle_text:
Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Eternal Thirst
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The land is ever resilient. Should it die, it will be reborn.

name: Festering Newt
oracle_text: When Festering Newt dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. That creature gets -4/-4 instead if you control a creature named Bogbrew Witch.
flavor_text: Its back bubbles like a witch's cauldron, and it smells just as vile.

name: Foul-Tongue Invocation
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Target player sacrifices a creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, you gain 4 life.

name: Frost Lynx
oracle_text: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

name: Furnace Whelp
oracle_text:
Flying
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

name: Fury Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
• Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card.

name: Greater Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

name: Grisly Spectacle
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller mills cards equal to that creature's power.
flavor_text:
"Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Guard Duty
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender.
flavor_text: "I was told these were standard issue. Do I look standard to you?"

name: Guardian Idol
oracle_text:
Guardian Idol enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}: Guardian Idol becomes a 2/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn.

name: Guided Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"May the Ancestor strengthen my hand and guide my blade."
—Nomad war prayer

name: Hammerhand
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

name: Heat Ray
oracle_text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
flavor_text:
"There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Hunt the Weak
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: Dragons scorn the weak, even among their own kind.

name: Infantry Veteran
oracle_text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Swords, to me! We must engage their line to protect our archers and mages. Let no one fail this task!"

name: Iona's Judgment
oracle_text: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavor_text: Beneath the gaze of angels, only the righteous may stand without fear.

name: Ivy Elemental
oracle_text: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: In the gardens of the centaurs, many travelers have mysteriously vanished while admiring the elaborate topiaries.

name: Jace's Phantasm
oracle_text:
Flying
Jace's Phantasm gets +4/+4 as long as an opponent has ten or more cards in their graveyard.
flavor_text: In the abstract memories of the Iquati, Jace found interesting ideas to improve upon.

name: Jaddi Offshoot
oracle_text:
Defender
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: On Murasa, even the trees grow trees.

name: Jhessian Thief
oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Jhessian Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Where's the fun in an escape if it's not at least a little daring?"

name: Keldon Halberdier
oracle_text:
First strike
Suspend 4—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Kiln Fiend
oracle_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Kiln Fiend gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It traps an explosion within its stony skin.

name: Lead the Stampede
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Manakin
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text:
"Each night, the artificer tucked the little doll into a locked drawer. Each morning, she awoke to find it waiting beside her with some new bauble."
—"The Artificer's Apprentice"

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Mark of Mutiny
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

name: Mind Stone
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?"
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Mnemonic Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
When Mnemonic Wall enters the battlefield, you may return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"It augments anamnesis. What is so confusing about that?"
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Moonglove Extract
oracle_text: Sacrifice Moonglove Extract: It deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Diluted, moonglove can etch living tissue. Concentrated, a drop will kill a giant.

name: Nantuko Shaman
oracle_text:
When Nantuko Shaman enters the battlefield, if you control no tapped lands, draw a card.
Suspend 1—{2}{G}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G}{G} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Nature's Claim
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all."
—Sildark, artificer of Omu

name: Netcaster Spider
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

name: Ojutai's Breath
oracle_text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Pentarch Ward
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As Pentarch Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color.
When Pentarch Ward enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Pentarch Ward.

name: Phantom Monster
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Is it an amalgamation of faded memories or the projection of a half-remembered dream? Neither answer offers any comfort.

name: Phantom Tiger
oracle_text:
Phantom Tiger enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Tiger, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Tiger.

name: Phyrexian Rager
oracle_text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I believe many worlds will bow to Phyrexia. Mirrodin is merely the first."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Pillar of Flame
oracle_text: Pillar of Flame deals 2 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: "May the worthy spend an eternity in Blessed Sleep. May the wicked find the peace of oblivion."

name: Prey's Vengeance
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Radiant Fountain
oracle_text:
When Radiant Fountain enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text:
"All peoples treasure a place where the weary traveler may drink in peace."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Rakdos Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: Rakdos rioters paint their faces to resemble the drakes' bloodied muzzles.

name: Reave Soul
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text:
"I was not convinced you had a soul until I saw it for myself."
—Liliana Vess

name: Repeal
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."
—Agosto, Azorius imperator

name: Riverwheel Aerialists
oracle_text:
Flying
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Adepts of the Riverwheel Stronghold can run through rain and never get wet; masters use the raindrops as stepping stones.

name: Rotfeaster Maggot
oracle_text: When Rotfeaster Maggot enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain life equal to that card's toughness.
flavor_text: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

name: Runed Servitor
oracle_text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

name: Scion of Ugin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: For hundreds of years Ugin slept, encased in the cocoon of stone and magic Sarkhan had created using a shard of a Zendikari hedron. As Ugin lay dormant, his spectral guardians kept vigil.

name: Search for Tomorrow
oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Seeker of the Way
oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Seeker of the Way gains lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I don't know where my destiny lies, but I know it isn't here."

name: Shimmering Grotto
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.

name: Shriekgeist
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Shriekgeist deals combat damage to a player, that player mills two cards.
flavor_text: Wounds of the flesh are easy to heal. Wounds of the mind may never be undone.

name: Splatter Thug
oracle_text:
First strike
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.

name: Stalwart Aven
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)

name: Star Compass
oracle_text:
Star Compass enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.
flavor_text: It doesn't point north. It points home.

name: Student of Ojutai
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Human enlightenment is a firefly that sparks in the night. Dragon enlightenment is a beacon that disperses all darkness."

name: Survival Cache
oracle_text:
You gain 2 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, draw a card.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Sustainer of the Realm
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Sustainer of the Realm blocks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: You may break her shield, but you'll never break her spirit.

name: Thought Scour
oracle_text:
Target player mills two cards.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"As you inject the *viscus vitae* into the brain stem, don't let the spastic moaning bother you. It will soon become music to your ears."
—Stitcher Geralf

name: Thrill-Kill Assassin
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: As the bounty on Massacre Girl rose, so did the number of imitators.

name: Timberland Guide
oracle_text: When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Can you build a fire? Track a deer? Identify killer trees? Then you'll never survive Kessig without me."

name: Tormenting Voice
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Unwelcome thoughts crowd my mind. Are they my own madness, or the whispers of another?"
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Do you hear that, Sarkhan? The glory of the horde! I made a legend from what you abandoned."
—Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

name: Vent Sentinel
oracle_text:
Defender
{1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control with defender.
flavor_text:
"Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Virulent Swipe
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Wall of Roots
oracle_text:
Defender
Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Mana grows and changes like the roots of a plant. Like a plant, it must be nurtured."
—Nissa Revane

name: Wight of Precinct Six
oracle_text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.
flavor_text: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

name: Wildsize
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Two times the size, four times the smell.

name: Wrench Mind
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards unless they discard an artifact card.
flavor_text: What is the sound of one head snapping?
